channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

item.description: Knockdown - Structure Fire; INC#1038; 03:42PM; 631 W 53rd St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3SxQnL5; #VermontSquare; *Address / Building Type Corrected*. First arriving 30 LAFD Firefighters took just 21 minutes to access, confine and fully extinguish an attic fire at a two story residential fourplex. No injury. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 46; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; BC13 E215 E221 E233 E266 E33 E46 E5 E57 RA46 RA846 SQ21 T15 T21 T33 T66; CH9; 12; Brian Humphrey

Structure Fire; INC#1038; 03:21PM; 628 W 52nd Pl; MAP: https://bit.ly/46Ixb1a; #VermontSquare; *Address Tentative*. PRELIM: Offensive fire attack at a 2 story home with heavy smoke showing from the attic.; FS 46; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; BC13 E215 E221 E233 E266 E33 E46 E5 E57 RA46 RA846 SQ21 T15 T21 T33 T66; CH9; 12; Brian Humphrey

Structure Fire; INC#1656; 10:47PM; 9306 N Woodman Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/40r8Vyx; Arleta; FIRE NOW OUT: One story, single family dwelling with moderate smoke showing upon LAFD arrival. Firefighters initiated an offensive operation and extinguished the contents fire in 22 minutes (30 firefighters). All occupants were out of the home upon arrival but the location of their pet dog was unknown. Firefighters located the dog (in good condition) and reunited it with the owners. One 15yo female patient was evaluated for possible smoke inhalation. The original 9-1-1 call was received at 10:25PM. No further details.; FS 7; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; BC12 E275 E298 E7 E75 E81 RA81 RA881 T75 T98; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1415; 07:42PM; 330 N Robinson St; MAP: https://bit.ly/46BBqM1; Westlake; KNOCKDOWN: 30 firefighters extinguished the fire in 12 minutes with no injuries reported. The building appears to be vacant and crews prevented the fire from extending up into the residential area. Cause and $ loss TBD. No further details.; FS 6; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 13; BC11 E11 E20 E211 E220 E6 RA6 RA806 T11 T20; CH9; 12; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#1415; 07:30PM; 330 N Robinson St; MAP: https://bit.ly/46BBqM1; Westlake; Two story, detached building with 1 floor residential over garage - garage well involved in fire. Firefighters are in the offensive mode.; FS 6; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 13; BC11 E11 E20 E211 E220 E6 RA6 RA806 T11 T20; CH9; 12; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire - FATALITY; INC#0543; 10:53AM; 1210 E 35th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3S8G8wp; Central-Alameda; KNOCKDOWN: 30 firefighters extinguished the fire in 35 minutes. The fire extended from a room in the back of the house up into the attic. While conducting their primary search of the involved room, firefighters located a deceased victim. LAFD Arson is responding for the investigation (protocol). LAFD PIO Captain Cody Weireter is responding for media availability. LA County Medical Examiner-Coroner will be the agency determining cause of death and patient identification. LAPD Inc# 1575 No further details.; FS 14; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 9; AR1 BC1 E14 E15 E215 E221 E46 EM1 PI3 RA15 RA46 RA815 SO1 T15 T21; CH9; 12; Margaret Stewart

Update Structure Fire - FATALITY; INC#0543; 10:46AM; 1210 E 35th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3S8G8wp; Central-Alameda; While firefighters continued to fight the fire which extended into the attic, crews conducted a search of the involved room and located one patient. Sadly (adult male) the patient is beyond medical help and determined deceased on scene. LAFD Arson will respond for the investigation per protocol for a fatality. Any questions regarding the patient are referred to the LA County Medical Examiner-Coroner who will handle cause death and patient identification. ; FS 14; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 9; AR1 BC1 E14 E15 E215 E221 E46 EM1 RA15 RA46 RA815 SO1 T15 T21; CH9; 12; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0543; 10:18AM; 1210 E 35th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3S8G8wp; Central-Alameda; One story, single family dwelling with smoke showing upon arrival. Firefighters are in the offensive mode and located fire in one room. ; FS 14; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 9; BC1 E14 E15 E215 E221 E46 RA15 RA815 T15 T21; CH9; 12; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0217; 06:04AM; 1281 W Exposition Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/494axlr; Exposition Park; KNOCKDOWN: 40 firefighters extinguished the fire in 33 minutes with no injuries reported. Crews anticipated to be on scene for another hour for overhaul. No further details.; FS 15; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC13 E15 E215 E226 E26 E34 E46 RA15 RA34 RA815 RA834 SQ21 T15 T26; CH7; 12 13; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0217; 05:31AM; 1281 W Exposition Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/494axlr; Exposition Park; 25' x 75' vacant commercial building (site of previous burn) with fire through the roof. Firefighters are in the defensive mode and no additional resources are anticipated to be required. There are no injuries reported.; FS 15; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC13 E15 E215 E226 E26 E34 E46 RA15 RA34 RA815 RA834 SQ21 T15 T26; CH9; 12 13; Margaret Stewart
